titleStmt.title: The state of the Church of Rome when the Reformation began as it appears by the advice given to Paul III and Julius III by creatures of their own : with a preface leading to the matter of the book.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Rogers ..., and Samuel Smith ...,
